thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Aluminum Rises on U.S. Tariff Recommendation

author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Aluminum Rises on U.S. Tariff Recommendation
text:
Prices of aluminum and shares of companies that produce the metal and steel rose Friday following the news that the Trump administration is weighing broad-based tariffs and quotas to curb imports.
Aluminum prices rose in London, climbing 2% to $2,208 a metric ton, following a report before the U.S. Commerce Departmentâ€™s official statement. Shares of aluminum producer Alcoa Corp. added 2%, while U.S. Steel shares climbed 10%.
Internal
